attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Horses are not to be slaughtered. TYheyb don't mean any harm and i am under 11 years old and i really want to stop horse slaughter and i have made a website called http://trigger00.jimdo.com aso a debait at school. Pleasestop this

rejection.details:
Hi Isabel

There's already a petition for you to join here:

http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/horsemeatban/

Thanks for your interest and for visiting the site.

Number 10 Website Team
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
